description: Designed to power through uphills and descents, the X ULTRA is now available in an all-winter version. Just as agile as a trail-running shoe, it offers all the stability, grip and protective comfort you need to tackle wintery terrain and cold temperatures. Not to mention cozy 3M Thinsulate™ insulation.
name: Salomon X Ultra 4 Mid Winter TS CSWP - Mens
